message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: Please track and compile the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland, for the period from January 2022 to April 2025 (including January 2022 and April 2025). Please cite all the statistics from government websites.

Please output the compiled data in one Markdown table format. The column names in the table should be, in order: Month, House Price in England (Pounds), House Price in Wales (Pounds), House Price in Scotland (Pounds), House Price in Northern Ireland (Pounds)
For the column 'Month', list the month in the format 2022/01, 2022/02.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the average monthly house prices for England, Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland from January 2022 to April 2025, I'll search through reliable government websites. </think>
<search> average monthly house prices for england scotland wales northern ireland from january 2022 to april 2025 </search>

Search query: average monthly house prices for england scotland wales northern ireland from january 2022 to april 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/inflationandpriceindices/bulletins/privaterentandhousepricesuk/december2025):
Private rent and house prices, UK: December 2025 Average house prices increased to £292,000 (1.4%) in England, £211,000 (1.5%) in Wales, and £192,000 (3.3%) in Scotland, in the 12 months to ...

[Doc 2](https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-house-price-index-for-january-2025):
UK House Price Index for January 2025 - GOV.UK UK house prices​​ On a non-seasonally adjusted basis, average house prices in the UK increased by 0.2% between December 2024 and January 2025, ...

[Doc 3](https://landregistry.data.gov.uk/app/ukhpi/):
UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the ...

[Doc 4](https://www.ros.gov.uk/about/news/2025/uk-house-price-index-figures-for-Scotland-2025):
UK House Price Index figures for Scotland 2025 The UK average house price was £270,000 which was an annual increase of 1.7% on October 2024. Compared with the previous month, UK house prices ...

[Doc 5](https://www.statista.com/statistics/620365/monthly-house-price-index-in-england-uk/?srsltid=AfmBOorF-xCwPXTfWjWMuXQ85P--HGNt5DZNbGJNcEPbJx6B-oRhRpKM):
Monthly house prices index England 2015-2025 - Statista The average house price in England started to increase in August 2024, after falling by over three percent year-on-year in December 2023.
I need to find specific data for each country from January 2022 to April 2025. I'll focus on reliable sources such as ONS, Land Registry, and other government websites.

</think>
<search> oxford economic indicators house prices scotland wales england northern ireland 2022 to 2025</search>

Search query: oxford economic indicators house prices scotland wales england northern ireland 2022 to 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.ons.gov.uk/visualisations/housingpriceslocal/E07000178/):
Housing prices in Oxford - Office for National Statistics The average house price in Oxford was £505,000 in October 2025 (provisional), down slightly 2.0% from October 2024. Across the South East, ...

[Doc 2](https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/sn02820/):
Housing market: Economic indicators - House of Commons Library House prices, as measured by the UK House Price Index, increased by 1.7% between October 2024 and October 2025. On a seasonally adjusted basis, ...

[Doc 3](https://www.gov.uk/government/statistics/uk-house-price-index-for-october-2025/uk-house-price-index-england-october-2025):
UK House Price Index England: October 2025 - GOV.UK Economic statement. Average house prices in England increased by 1.4% in the 12 months to October 2025, to £292,000 (provisional estimate).

[Doc 4](https://www.savills.com/research_articles/255800/378921-0):
UK Housing Market Update - July 2025 - Savills They are still up 2.1% on a 12 month basis however. Only two regions saw value growth during Q2: Scotland and the North East, up 0.8% and 0.4% ...

[Doc 5](https://www.ros.gov.uk/about/news/2025/uk-house-price-index-figures-for-Scotland-2025):
UK House Price Index figures for Scotland 2025 The latest HPI for Scotland shows the average price of a property in Scotland in October 2025 was £192,000, an increase of 3.3% when compared to ...
I need to gather the data specifically for each month from January 2022 to April 2025. I'll continue to search for the required information.

</think>

UK House Price Index - Land Registry As of October 2025, the average house price in the UK is £269,862, and the index stands at 103.4. Property prices have fallen by 0.1% compared to the ...
